docs.snippet: A bus veered off a mountain highway in Nepal and plunged into a river before dawn Thursday, killing 14 people and injuring seven others, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bus veered off a mountain highway in Nepal and plunged into a river before dawn Thursday, killing 14 people and injuring seven others, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Small Dreams Set Afire on Marcos-Era Streets
headline.seo: Lino Brocka’s ‘Manila in the Claws of Light’
headline.main: Small Dreams Set Afire on Marcos-Era Streets
headline.kicker: Movie Review | 'Manila in the Claws of Light'

docs.snippet: Lino Brocka’s “Manila in the Claws of Light,” at the Museum of Modern Art, is a 1975 movie about the limits to life in the Philippines under the dictator Ferdinand E. Marcos....
docs.abstract: Manhola Dargis reviews movie Manila in the Claws of Light by Filipino director Lino Brocka.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lino Brocka’s “Manila in the Claws of Light,” at the Museum of Modern Art, is a 1975 movie about the limits to life in the Philippines under the dictator Ferdinand E. Marcos.

headline.print_headline: Nowitzki Has 26 to Lead Mavs Past Grizzlies 110-96
headline.main: Nowitzki Has 26 to Lead Mavs Past Grizzlies 110-96

docs.snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 26 points, Brandan Wright added 17 and the Dallas Mavericks used a second-half surge to grab a 110-96 victory over the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday night....

headline.print_headline: China Criticizes Japan Over Comments Doubting Nanjing Massacre
headline.main: China Criticizes Japan Over Comments Doubting Nanjing Massacre

docs.snippet: China's Foreign Ministry has criticized remarks by a board member of Japan's state broadcaster who said a massacre carried out by Japanese troops in China's then-capital of Nanjing in 1937 did not happen....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's Foreign Ministry has criticized remarks by a board member of Japan's state broadcaster who said a massacre carried out by Japanese troops in China's then-capital of Nanjing in 1937 did not happen.

headline.print_headline: Blazers Shoot Poorly but Hold Off Knicks, 94-90
headline.main: Blazers Shoot Poorly but Hold Off Knicks, 94-90

docs.snippet: Nicolas Batum had 20 points and 10 rebounds, Wesley Matthews scored 18 points, and the Portland Trail Blazers overcame poor-shooting nights by their two All-Stars to beat the New York Knicks 94-90 on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nicolas Batum had 20 points and 10 rebounds, Wesley Matthews scored 18 points, and the Portland Trail Blazers overcame poor-shooting nights by their two All-Stars to beat the New York Knicks 94-90 on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: UN Says Illegal Excavations in Syria Are 'Lethal'
headline.main: UN Says Illegal Excavations in Syria Are 'Lethal'

docs.snippet: Illegal excavations are taking place at important archaeological sites all over Syria that are "extremely dangerous" and "lethal" to the country's cultural heritage, the U.N. cultural agency said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Illegal excavations are taking place at important archaeological sites all over Syria that are "extremely dangerous" and "lethal" to the country's cultural heritage, the U.N. cultural agency said Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: China Media Slams Philippine Leader Comments on Disputed Waters
headline.main: China Media Slams Philippine Leader Comments on Disputed Waters

docs.snippet: Chinese state media has slammed Philippine President Benigno Aquino over remarks that compared Beijing's claims in the disputed South China Sea to demands for land made by Nazi Germany to the former Czechoslovakia....
